document_data.name: Marsember Blush
document_data.mainbody: '''Marsember Blush''' was wine of good vintage exported from [[Marsember]] as far as [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] in the 13{{th}} century [[DR]] and cities like [[Baldur's Gate]] and [[Athkatla]] of the [[Sword Coast]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Marsember Blush was a popular and widely consumed wine that tasted of a fruit blend and [[spices]] with a fragrance of dew-flowers. The unique and popular flavor of the wine came from the firm [[grape]]s of Marsember vineyards that carried the region's fragrant salty air of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
